name: BBSolar
0:
”Alexa, turn on light.”
”Alexa, turn off light.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Thank you for choosing BBSolar products.
First of all, download, install and login BBSolar App on your smart phone. Then add your BBSolar devices following instructions in BBSolar App. After that, find BBSolar skill in Amazon Alexa App then verify and link your BBSolar account.
BBSolar skill is designed for BBSolar smart plug, bulb, surge protector, wall switch, humidifier, thermostat valve, and etc.
Simple device, simplify your life. :-)
